page.title: 16Queen Mary's Hosp.Carshalton
page.content: Queen Mary's was opened in l9O9 as a long stay children's hospital, but was named in l9l4 when Queen Mary became a Patron. 3O years later it became a general children's hospital. In l959 it amalgamated with a hospital for mentally handicapped children, forming the first comprehensive children's hospital in the UK. It now has 24O mentally handicapped beds, 2O6 paedia_ tric beds and 26 psychiatric beds. The wards are in bungalows set in 9O acres. The mentally handicapped people stay even when they reach l7 but the paediatric move to other hospitals. There are units for further education and training and a special one for disturbed residents. Radio Lollipop provides support to patients and staff.A recreation dept. and a toy library provides play therapy aided by strong voluntary support.
